sentences.en: I chose dis - fellowshipped and became officially unaffiliated with the church.
sentences.cn: 最后我选择了退会,正式与教会划清关系.

sentences.en: Unaffiliated students will be randomly assigned to other teams by teachers.
sentences.cn: 未分组的学生将由老师随机分配到其他团队.

sentences.en: Unaffiliated students will be randomly assigned to teams by me at that time.
sentences.cn: 下课前未分组的学生将由教授随机分配到其他团队.

words.tran_cn: 独立的；未结合的；非附属的
